about_the_game:
Cursed Deal is a Co-Op horror game like nothing you've ever experienced before. The game focuses on a dark vampire cult and features a villain who becomes cursed by betraying his cult on the night of the ritual and turns into a dark creature. The player who made a deal with the devil to get rid of the curse, must hunt down cult members and curse them into his side. Meanwhile, the cultists must complete the ritual and gain vampire powers on this challenging night. But beware! When humans turn into vampires, the roles will change and the creature hunt will begin. You never know who will win in this game where teams and roles will change, where the hunter can be the prey and the prey can be the hunter. Hide in the dark, use your special powers, and survive. Most importantly, don't trust anyone. If your friend is cursed, he will turn into a creature and come after you.

HIGHLIGHTS

SWITCH ROLES BECOME THE HUNTER

In this game, the balance can change at any moment. Focus on your goal and complete the ritual. As you turn into the vampire, you will see those who were trying to hunt you just ran away.


OLD FRIEND NEW ENEMY

There is no getting bored in this game. The new dynamics and objectives that are unlocked when you are cursed and turned into the creature will offer you new experiences until the end of the match.


WELL OPTIMIZED NEXT GEN GRAPHICS

The best graphics you've ever seen in a Co-Op Horror game. Developed with Unreal Engine 5. Enhanced by Ray Tracing, DLSS, and FSR.



EQUIP SPECIAL POWERS AND BECOME UNPREDICTABLE

Level up and unlock new powers. But Beware! In each game, you will encounter rival players with different powers.


FEATURES

  • Fully online thriller and horror PvP experience for up to 5 players
  • Various jump scares (New jump scares on the way)
  • Loot, trapping, and survival dynamics
  • Character Customization
  • Different types of special powers and passive abilities (New special powers on the way)
  • Level up system
  • In-game 3D voice communication
  • Optimized next-gen graphics (New optimizations on the way)
